column1: '''''silmë''''' is a noun meaning "starlight" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App
column2: Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>
left]]''Silmë'' is also the name in Quenya of the twenty-ninth letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref name="Names"/>  In all modes this letter represents '''S'''.<ref>{{App
column3: Letters}}, Note, ''The additional letters''</ref> The Westron name for this letter is '''''Só'''''.<ref>See [[Westron Tengwar]]</ref>

column1: <!-- An extra blank line is added to prevent the Etymology section title from being indented. -->
The word derives from the [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme
